sentences.en: Bob Bowman, longtime coach of swimming phenom Michael Phelps, was once asked why Phelps did not swim the languorous distance sets that were part of some other competitors' regimens.
sentences.cn: 游泳天才菲尔普斯的教练鲍曼曾经被问及，为什么菲尔普斯不做令人厌倦的长距离游泳训练？ 而长距离游泳正是其他竞争对手训练的一部分。

sentences.en: Would you say the Phenom is enjoying a good reception in the market?
sentences.cn: 您认为翼龙已被市场很好的接受了么?

sentences.en: Yankees manager Joe Torre estimates that the phenom will miss 4 - 6 weeks.
sentences.cn: 洋基老爹预估这位新秀会错过四到六周的赛事.

trans.tran_en: a person or thing of outstanding abilities or qualities
